data.actual_result: It shows the divider that separates the servers from the channels/DMs for sometime. If you cannot reproduce in the first time, keep trying it again and again with extremely brief intervals.
data.expected_result: It shows the users from the start.
data.short_description: When you access the quick switcher through the black bar above the friends tab, it shows the server icon divider for a short time even though a filter has already been set for users .
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the DM menu. - Click on "Find or start a conversation".
